name: Night at The Museum (Virbonis)
description:
Welcome to Night at The Museum!

Here, you will play as the tour-guide trainee and will be tested with many objectives that you need to complete in order to get the job. This game will bring you to one of the museums that's located in Jakarta and that is Museum Sejarah Jakarta. It has a lof of informations about history of Jakarta and the cultural herritage inside of it.

This game has free exploration that you can navigate the character through out the gameplay, you can move your character in any direction with the given analog to walk around the museum. This game has some feature for you to give more insight about the cultural herritage object by using the inspect feature to rotate and discover the detail of each objects. More so, this game has a puzzle that you need to solve and challenges that you need to tackle in order to finish the game. Your exploration skill is needed in this game. So, keep looking around as you explore.

Credits :
Game Designer & 3D Artist : Dicky Hertanto
Game Programmer : Chandra Delon and Chang Minhuei

Musics :
Tenderness by Bensound
Almost in F by Kevin MacLeod (incompotech.com)

SFX :
Door Slide Sound Effect by UTOOBASAURUS
Door Unlock Sound Effect by CR Sound Effects
Book Sound Effect by All Sounds
Book Flips Sound Effect by All Sounds
Press Button SFX by Masgame
School Bell Ring SFX by ScCrystal's Diary

Note : We did not own rights to these arts, musics, images, SFX, and fonts.
